item.title: Hello World
item.description: Introduction So I finally setup a blog on what I’ve been doing lately but this is just an introduction so actually, #WHATS UP! What you’ll find in the future mostly here is a bunch of my ramblings about functional programming, programming, haskell and memoryleaks; Just kidding, I’m more of a user-friendly blogger who’ll most likely teach you about Monads and arguing about the fundamentals of Computer Science just because I can ;)
